goal.ch: 現代的科技的進步對今日的生命科學有著深遠的影嚮。現今的生物學家可以取得大量的次世代定序與功能性因基體數據並且運用電腦來進行分析。這些先進的工具令生物學家可以透過基因體規模的實驗且以全面性的觀點來學習並檢視生物學上問題。本課程將透過講述與討論當代之文獻以培養學生成為能以基因體規模的觀點來思考生物學上之問題的下一個世代之生物學家。
goal.en: The advances in technology have profoundly impacted today’s biology. . It allows biologists to collect massive amounts of genome-scale sequence and functional data (genomics) and analyze them computationally (bioinformatics). Therefore biologists are able to ask questions in a global view in biology and try to answer them through genomic approaches. This course introduces students to fundamental aspects in genome biology through lectures and reading of current research articles and cultivates students to think biological questions in the genome-scale as a next generation biologist.

outline.ch:
“第一週 基因體學概述
第二週 基因體定序.
第三週 基因體序列組合與詮釋
第四週 序列分析與序列比對
第五週 基因群組
第六週 期中考 1
第七週        序列搜尋
第八週        基因體變異
第九週 單一核?酸多型性分析
第十週 轉錄體學：測量與分析基因表達 1
第十一週 轉錄體學：測量與分析基因表達 2
第十二週 期中考 2
第十三週 轉錄子之染色質免疫沈澱
第十四週 表觀遺傳組學
第十五週 蛋白體學與研究方法
第十六週 基因體資料探勘
第十七週 學生發表資料搜尋成果
第十八週 期末考“
outline.en:
“Week 1 Overview and introduction to genomics.
Week 2 Genome Sequencing.
Week 3 Genome assembly and Annotation.
Week 4 Sequence analysis and alignment.
Week 5 Clusters of Gene Families.
Week 6 Midterm I
Week 7        Perform a BLAST search
Week 8        Genomic Variation: SNPs, repeats, duplications and rearrangements.
Week 9 SNP Genotyping
Week 10 Transcriptomics: Measurement and analysis of gene expression I
Week 11 Transcriptomics: Measurement and analysis of gene expression II
Week 12 Midterm II
Week 13 Chromatin Immunoprecipitation of transcription factors
Week 14 Epigenomics
Week 15 Proteomics methods and applications
Week 16 Genomic Data Mining
Week 17 Persenting database searching results
Week 18 Final Exam“

textbook.ch:
“A Primer of Genome Science, 3rd edition, Greg Gibson and Spencer V. Muse (2009, Sinauer)
Genomes, 2nd edition, NCBI Bookshelf ID: NBK21134“
textbook.en:
“A Primer of Genome Science, 3rd edition, Greg Gibson and Spencer V. Muse (2009, Sinauer)
